sent.orig: One-part Sentence or Two-part Sentence? Complete Sentence or Incomplete Sentence?
sent.trans: 单部句还是双部句？完全句还是不完全句？

sent.orig: Syntactically marker is restricted in sentence-medial or sentence-end positions but never occurs in the sentence-initial position.
sent.trans: 句法上，“■■■”只能位于句中、句尾，而不能位于句首，这是由其功能所决定的。

sent.orig: In coherent writing, every sentence is connected in thought to the previous sentence.
sent.trans: 在连贯性的写作中，每一个句子都是与前面的句子相关联的。

sent.orig: The translation checks with the original, sentence for sentence.
sent.trans: 译文能忠实于原文，能逐句对照。

sent.orig: The method of news sentence extraction, sentence importance calculation and redundancy reducing is introduced.
sent.trans: 介绍了句子抽取方法、句子重要度计算、句子冗余减小方法。
